Performer:
Takemoto Datejidayū (see also Takemoto Datetayū V) (竹本伊達路大夫)

Alternate Name: Takemoto Datetayū V (竹本伊達大夫 (五))

Dates: '1950-1988/04'

Specialty: Tayu

Notes: Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994)


– Click image to view.
